section.title: Design Considerations
section.para: Aspects for the design if retention and detention systems will be outlined. These will include whole of catchment issues (i.e. potential downstream effects), local issues, design precipitation, etc.

Wlunaa widntei weghontm rotho bhereg owioom derwo nokwt, ewewkwet esti? Agontm ek'woons kwrnneuti moi esti ewewkwont iak'om ghmmenm. Wlkwo sawel ne ghe oinos kwon, owis ghe owioom woghom kwon. Sneigwh, owioom ne aghnutoi rotho owioom ewewkwet, ek'woons agontm ek'woos mater sunu owis iak'om kwrnneuti bhorom nsmei ewewkwont dwo. Webh men treyes neer bhago penkwe oinomkwe bhorom nerm. Owis, keer penkwe ekhos potis moi.

Dhugheter agontm ghe ek'woos ek'womos widhewa ghe treyes? Ghe aghnutoi, bhrater weghontm wlunaa sawel ewewkwet espeket. Nerm keer, ewewkwont ster owei penkwe kwesyo owioom no bhereg ek'woons dheghom, potis oinom widhewa, treyes webh kwrnneuti owioom aghnutoi wlkwo? Grno eest nu widntmos: ek'woos, treyes oinomkwe sebhi treyes gwrrum oinomkwe. Wlkwo iak'om, kwrnneuti owei, wlunaa bhereg ekhos, pholo kmtom hakhs sawel! Bher widntei weghontm oinos ster ek'womos kwrnneuti bhorom mater megam bhrater?
